title: Introducing: Seramic
content:
In the lull between our festive decadence and the heady heights of New Year we’ve come across a soulful masterpiece, ‘People Say’.

There is very little information surrounding the track at this present time, however we know it’s the work of an artist called ‘Seramic’.

Built on a bedrock warbling guitar lines and rising choral vocals, the song reaches out to the listener with a veil of intimacy, while working it’s way through periods of fragility and releases of resilience.

We look forward to hearing more from Seramic in 2016.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
